page.title: 04Changes People Would Like
page.content: People were asked what changes they would like to see in Kirkby. The main one was more {play areas}and { {parks}for children. The next was more swimming baths and cinemas to go to. A lot of people said more shops would be nice and one said they would like to see the old sort of shops come back. People would like to see less vandalism and lots of people were in favour of more jobs, better roads and more youth clubs. One man even said he'd like to blow up Kirkby and start again. A few people said they would like to see Kirkby kept cleaner, more police and more things for handicapped people.
